result.execSummary:
The defendant Justin L Reynolds was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Possession of Methamphetamine [Modifiers: PTAC, as a Party to a Crime], a class I felony, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(3g)(g).

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Justin L Reynolds

records.addlTxt: w/Notice of Right to Seek Postconviction Relief

Case Called: 2:28 pm
INCLUDES 22CF80 & 20CF390.
Clerk: Kassidi.
State appears by ADA Sid Brubacher in person:
Defendant appears in custody, in person, and with Atty Trevor Peterson in person;
Date and time set for a Preliminary/Plea Hearing in 22CF80 & a Sentencing Hearing on Revocation in 20CF390.
VRCW. 
PRELIMINARY HEARING IN 22CF80:
Waiver of Prelim. filed.  
Court questions deft as to waiver.
Court finds waiver freely and voluntarily made.
COURT finds PC - Defendant bound over for arraignment & trial.  
Information to be E-filed.  Reading Waived.

Plea Quest/Waiver of Rights & Counsel filed. State moves to:
22CF80:
Ct. 1>> Delete 'Repeater' Enhancer.
Ct. 2 (Resisting or Obstructing an Officer-Repeater)>>DRI.

COURT GRANTS ABOVE.
  
PLEA: 
Ct. 1 (Possession of Methamphetamine-PTAC)>> GUILTY.

Crt advises def of rights & penalties & ques def to understanding.  Crt finds plea & waiver freely & vol made, a factual basis & def guilty.  

COURT ORDERS: 
Ct. 1 (Possession of Methamphetamine-PTAC)>> 6 Months MCJ, Concurrent. No objection to EMP/Huber privileges. Court Costs; DNA Sample and Surcharge. Court finds 30 Days Credit.

SENTENCING HEARING ON REVOCATION IN 20CF390:
Ct. 2 (Retail Theft-Intentionally Take (<=$500)-Repeater)>> 6 Months MCJ, Concurrent. No objection to EMP/Huber privileges. Any outstanding financial obligations to be converted to a civil judgment. Court finds 32 Days Credit.

Adjourned: 2:41 pm

Discovery exchanged-no
Offer made/received-yes
Matter already set  2/16/2022 for Prelim; may be a plea
